title: Uma vida agradável
quote: creating a life that feels good > a life that looks good.
author: Véronique

title: Black Alien - Que nem o meu cachorro
quote: Se custou a minha paz, já custou caro demais.
author: Black Alien

title: John Irving on courage to live
quote: If you're lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.
author: John Irving

title: Haruki Murakami on reading
quote: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking.
author: Haruki Murakami
